unnormalised:
Hella, Mehndi do Priya-then:
12, Gulmohar Park, Andheri West, Mumbai, 400058.
Shaadi do Grand Hyatt, Bandra Kurla Complex, Mumbai, 400054 re - 7:30 PM re bon nel-en-a!
Reception do Taj Lands End re, ona ilaqa re ge, pin code 400050, menkhan hiju:k hilok 8 PM thik bera re, thik ge, dada?
normalised:
Helo, Mehendi do Priya ohak' re: baroh, Gulmohar Park, Andheri Paschim, Mumbai, 400058.
Harup do Grand Hyatt re, Bandra Kurla Complex, Mumbai, 400054 - sāy hay baje sanj re onde napam huyuh-a!
Reception do Taj Lands End re, ona leka thāw re, pin code 400050, menkhan hijuk' din re gel baje sanj khātīr, thek' a kan, bhāi?
text:
Hella, Mehndi do Priya-then:
12, Gulmohar Park, Andheri West, Mumbai, 400058.
Shaadi do Grand Hyatt, Bandra Kurla Complex, Mumbai, 400054 re - 7:30 PM re bon nel-en-a!
Reception do Taj Lands End re, ona ilaqa re ge, pin code 400050, menkhan hiju:k hilok 8 PM thik bera re, thik ge, dada?
